doubleJump.SkillDescription: Allows the user to jump twice.

hp.SkillDescription: You gain more health and become harder to kill.

attackDamage.SkillDescription: Increases the damage of your attacks.

critChance.SkillDescription: Your attacks have a chance to crit.

slowDownTime.SkillDescription: Allows the user to slow down time.

parry.SkillDescription: Allows the user to block attacks.

invisibility.SkillDescription: Allows the user to become invisible for a duration.

waterWalking.SkillDescription: Allows the user to walk on water.

moveSpeed.SkillDescription: Grants the user increased movement speed.

stun.SkillDescription: Allows the user to stun a target for a duration.

regen.SkillDescription: Grants the user ability to slowly regenerate missing health.

attackSpeed.SkillDescription: Grants the user increased attack speed.
